Summary: triangle with random light pattern that sort of light like morse code
divs: Sighting Detailsone night i was just looking at the stars off of my porch and i saw what looked to be a triangular constellation but upon further inspection the "stars" were blinking in an unusual pattern. the craft hovered for awhile and the ascended in a path north and the ultra speed and dissapeared
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Watervliet
There were no other sightings in Watervliet on or around August 19th 2013
